alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Newton; Orange (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued April 15 at 10:12PM CDT until April 16 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 141 REMAINS VALID UNTIL MIDNIGHT CDT TONIGHT FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN LOUISIANA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 9 PARISHES IN CENTRAL LOUISIANA AVOYELLES EVANGELINE RAPIDES ST. LANDRY IN SOUTHWEST LOUISIANA ALLEN BEAUREGARD CALCASIEU CAMERON IN WEST CENTRAL LOUISIANA VERNON IN TEXAS THIS WATCH INCLUDES 3 COUNTIES IN SOUTHEAST TEXAS JEFFERSON NEWTON ORANGE THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ALEXANDRIA, BEAUMONT, BEAVER, BLEAKWOOD, BRIDGE CITY, BUNDICK LAKE, BUNKIE, BURKEVILLE, CALL, COTTONPORT, DE RIDDER, EFFIE, EUNICE, FARRSVILLE, FIELDS, FORT POLK, HACKBERRY, JAMESTOWN, JOHNSON BAYOU, KINDER, LAKE CHARLES, LAWTELL, LEESVILLE, MAMOU, MANSURA, MARKSVILLE, NEWTON, OAKDALE, OPELOUSAS, ORANGE, ORETTA, PICKERING, PINEVILLE, REDDELL, SABINE PASS, SEA RIM STATE PARK, SIMMESPORT, SLAGLE, ST. LANDRY, SULPHUR, VIDOR, VILLE PLATTE, AND WIERGATE.
